name: Purple ROBLOX (v1.1.2)
description: "Sick of the normal blue ROBLOX layout? Like the colour purple? Well then give this layout a try!"
additional_info:
A copy of style 117504 (CC-BY-NC-ND) by NintendoCube, which is itself
a copy of style 108334 (CC-BY) by user 270497 (which wasn't credited) with minor changes.

This copy satisfies both authors' licenses.
